column5: I'll be down in the Clearwater  FLA area the last two weeks of August. I was wondering if anyone from the board will be in the area, and wanted to split a fishing charter. I'm flexible with inshore, offshore, or species, I just want to split the costs.  Cheers!
Darn, if it was around christmas time, I would do it! My in-laws have a place in Venice, FLA, and we are going down for Christmas this year.  Hopefully make the 10lb club this year!!!
I focus on the saltwater fishing while I'm down there, primarily from the beach. There are some monsters lurking pretty close to shore.  This 15lb snook was caught off of the beach last summer.
thats one bad ass snook man!
Thanks,  Shore fishing in saltwater is a different beast than up here in Canada. You never know what you're gonna catch in the ocean.  Cheers!
